and.attribute: No. 8 Street 6, VSIP Bac Ninh Service, Urban and Industrial Park, Phu Chan Commune, Tu Son Town, Bac Ninh Province

- End to end ownership from assigned group: - Group resources planning and arrangement against fine scheduling; - Production delivery – OTD, production efficiency - Safety – Zero Harm Culture – Incident rate; - Quality – DQ, MFR, Audit failures; Kaizen; - Cost – Scrap rate, MFR; - Ensure DL technical competence are up to required level; - Grievance redress as per policy, promote & adhere to Nokia Values

- Production experience 5-7 years, handling 500+directs - Quality problem solving tools & methods - Exposure to Cost Governance - Supervisory skills - Interpersonal relationship skill - E2E Manufacturing process understanding - Planning and logistics knowledge - Managerial courage - WORK IN SHIFTS

and.attribute: Everyday, 1/5 world population use Nokia mobile phones. Nokia – one of global leaders in mobile communications whose products have become an integral part of the lives of people around the world. Sharing experiences, accessing information, finding your way or simply speaking to one another, Nokia is there to help you. Connecting people is our mission. Our goal is to build great mobile products that enable billions of people worldwide to enjoy more of what life has to offer. Nokia Vietnam is proud to be the newest and the most special Nokia manufacturer globally. We go on an adventure every day. Join us to build and help create an exciting new chapter in the mobile industry. Apply your skills and creativity to explore the possibilities of a rapidly changing world. We care about each and every one of our team member, not only about your career, but your life as a whole. We are looking for the following positions and hope receiving your application and CVs. Join us to build a career you’ll be proud of! View more More jobs from this employer
